si.t: RELATED COURSES TO PURSUE IN COLLEGE
Academic
Tech - Pro

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 1. Computer Science -

High aptitude in Logical Reasoning and Mathematical Ability with a Strong Inclination for Computational Problem-Solving and Digital Innovation. This suggests a preference for abstract design, algorithmic development, and systems thinking (Investigative & Conventional/Realistic).

si.t: Software Development, AI / Data Science, Digital Forensics, Computer Engineering
Finite Mathematics 1, Finite Mathematics 2, General Physics 1, General Physics 2, Business 1, Research Methods, Fundamentals of Data Analytics, Database Management Design and Innovation
Computer Programming(JAVA), Computer Programming(ORACLE), Computer Programming(.NET TECHNOLOGY), Electronics Product Assembly and Servicing
I am interested in writing clean, efficient code to build responsive and user-friendly software applications.
I want to delve into machine learning algorithms to create intelligent models that process vast datasets.
I am interested in designing and managing complex architectures for large-scale data storage and retrieval.
I want to study neural networks and natural language processing to develop systems that mimic human cognition.
I am fascinated by the full software development lifecycle, from gathering user requirements to system maintenance.
I want to optimize database queries and data warehousing techniques to drive business intelligence.
I am interested in specializing in front-end development using modern UI/UX design principles and frameworks.
I want to explore the mathematical foundations of cryptography to secure digital communication and data.
I am driven to build and train deep learning models for computer vision or autonomous system tasks.
I want to master DevOps practices to automate software delivery and improve infrastructure reliability.
I am interested in developing firmware and embedded systems for Internet of Things (IoT) devices.
I want to use statistical inference and A/B testing to guide digital product feature decisions.
I am keen on architecting scalable and fault-tolerant applications on global cloud computing platforms.
I want to explore ethical AI practices to ensure algorithms are fair, transparent, and socially responsible.
I am interested in developing video game engines and real-time graphics rendering algorithms.
I want to learn parallel computing techniques to optimize code for high-performance multi-core processors.
I am driven to develop recommender systems that personalize digital content for millions of users.
I want to learn compiler design and operating system internals to understand hardware-software interactions.
I am interested in creating interactive data visualization tools that make complex information understandable.
I want to use anomaly detection and machine learning to identify and prevent digital fraud.
RECOMMENDED ELECTIVES TO TAKE IN SSHS

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 2. Information Technology -

High scores in Technical-Vocational Aptitude (Visual Manipulative Skills & Clerical Ability) with a Strong Inclination for Systems Management and Security. This indicates strength in practical application, data organization, and network defense (Realistic & Conventional).

si.t: IT, ICT Support, Computer Programming, Bioinformatics, Mangement Information System, Cybersecurity, Network Administration, Systems Analysis
Finite Mathematics 1 & 2, Business 1 & 2, Research Methods, Fundamentals of Data Analytics, Database Management Design and Innovation
Animation, Illustration, Visual Graphic Design, Computer Programming(JAVA), Computer Programming(ORACLE), Computer Programming(.NET TECHNOLOGY), Broadband Installation
I am driven to identify security vulnerabilities through ethical hacking and penetration testing.
I want to design and maintain secure enterprise networks to ensure continuous business operations.
I am interested in bridging the gap between business needs and technological IT infrastructure solutions.
I want to create disaster recovery plans and intrusion detection systems to protect organizational data.
I am fascinated by server virtualization and cloud storage management for global digital services.
I want to specialize in digital forensics to investigate and recover data after security breaches.
I am interested in managing large-scale IT projects using agile and waterfall methodologies.
I want to configure and secure wireless networks and VPNs for remote employee access.
I am keen on performing cost-benefit analyses for IT hardware and software procurement.
I want to implement Identity and Access Management (IAM) systems to control user permissions.
I am interested in mastering containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes for IT efficiency.
I want to develop security awareness training programs to protect employees from social engineering.
I am driven to translate operational requirements into technical specifications for IT teams.
I want to monitor network traffic performance metrics to optimize the end-user experience.
I am interested in ensuring organizational compliance with data privacy laws like GDPR and HIPAA.
I want to manage relational and non-relational database systems to ensure data integrity.
I am driven to implement Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) for real-time monitoring.
I want to analyze data flows to ensure seamless integration between different enterprise applications.
I am interested in designing zero-trust network security architectures for modern businesses.
I want to lead IT service desks to resolve technical issues and maintain high user satisfaction.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 3. Civil Engineering -

High Scientific Ability and Visual Manipulative Skills with a Strong Inclination for Infrastructure Planning and Large-Scale Physical Design. This reflects an interest in applied physics, sustainable design, and construction oversight (Realistic & Investigative).

si.t: Construction Management, Infrastructure, Environmental Engineering, System Engineering, Actuarial Science
Physics 1 & 2,Chemistry 1 & 2, Earth & Space Science 1 & 2, Finite Math
Construction Operation, Sustainable Construction, Infrastructure Design, Technical Drafting, Visual graphic Design, Illustration, Computer Programing ( Java, .net, or oracle)
I want to manage large-scale construction projects and ensure structural safety from design to completion.
I am interested in designing essential public infrastructure such as bridges and mass transit systems.
I want to develop sustainable solutions for urban water resources and wastewater treatment.
I am fascinated by geotechnical analysis to ensure stable foundations for heavy structures.
I want to conduct environmental impact assessments to ensure eco-friendly urban development.
I am interested in using Building Information Modeling (BIM) for 3D simulation of civil works.
I want to plan efficient transportation systems and design intelligent traffic control networks.
I am driven to design resilient distribution networks for clean drinking water in municipalities.
I want to implement earthquake retrofitting techniques to improve the resilience of old buildings.
I am interested in utilizing GIS for site planning and monitoring topographical changes.
I want to manage construction site safety and supervise labor to ensure regulatory compliance.
I am interested in studying urban hydrology to manage storm runoff and prevent flooding.
I want to develop smart-city infrastructure that incorporates green spaces and renewable energy.
I am driven to research and test low-carbon concrete and recycled materials for construction.
I want to manage occupational health and safety protocols at large-scale engineering sites.
I am interested in coastal engineering to protect urban structures against rising sea levels.
I want to assess slope stability and soil mechanics to prevent landslides in mountainous regions.
I am interested in designing municipal landfill systems that minimize soil and water contamination.
I want to analyze wind and seismic loads to ensure the stability of ultra-tall skyscrapers.
I am interested in managing public-private partnerships for financing large public works.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 4. Mechanical Engineering

- High aptitude in Mathematical Ability and Scientific Ability with a Strong Inclination for Engineering Mechanics, Robotics, and Manufacturing Processes. This points to a preference for designing, building, and optimizing tangible mechanical products (Realistic & Investigative).

si.t: Manufacturing,Geodetic Engineering, Automotive, Robotics, Energy Systems,Construction Engineering & Management
General Physics 1 & 2, General Chemistry 1 & 2, Finite Mathematics 1 &2, Earth and Space Science 1 &2,

Automotive Servicing, Mechatronics, Robotics & Automation, Advanced Manufacturing, Manual Metal Arc Welding, Technical Drafting, Photovoltaic System Installation, Computer Programing ( Java, .net, or oracle) , Electronics Product Assembly and Servicing
I want to design and optimize automated production lines for industrial manufacturing.
I am interested in engineering fuel-efficient engines and studying thermodynamic cycles.
I want to integrate advanced sensors and control logic for autonomous robotic systems.
I am fascinated by thermal power generation systems and energy conversion devices.
I want to use CAD and Finite Element Analysis (FEA) to perform stress tests on new products.
I am interested in mechatronics, the synergy of mechanical, electrical, and computer systems.
I want to optimize the performance of fluid machinery such as pumps and turbines.
I am keen on using 3D printing and additive manufacturing for rapid hardware prototyping.
I want to research composite materials and metal alloys to create more durable components.
I am interested in designing biomedical devices such as robotic prosthetics and implants.
I want to solve heat transfer problems to protect electronics and industrial machinery.
I am driven to develop high-performance control systems for autonomous vehicle navigation.
I want to design mechanical components for renewable energy systems like wind turbines.
I am interested in simulating multi-body dynamics to predict how complex machines will move.
I want to ensure mechanical safety through failure analysis and non-destructive testing (NDT).
I am interested in designing high-pressure vessels and piping for chemical and oil industries.
I want to study mechanical vibrations to reduce noise and wear in consumer products.
I am keen on developing soft robotics using smart materials that change shape with stimulus.
I want to optimize combustion efficiency in engines to reduce harmful environmental emissions.
I am interested in performing life-cycle assessments (LCA) to minimize manufacturing waste.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 5. Electrical Engineering

- High aptitude in Scientific Ability and Logical Reasoning with a Strong Inclination for Power Systems, Telecommunications, and Circuit Design. This suggests a core interest in the control and application of electrical energy and information transfer (Investigative & Realistic).

si.t: Power Systems, Electronics, Telecommunications, Industrial Engineering, Systems Engineering
General Physics 1 & 2, General Chemistry 1 & 2, Finite Mathematics,
Electronics product Assembly and Servicing, Mechatronics, Electrical System Installation, Manual, Metal Arc Welding, Power Systems, Electronic Design, Computer Programing ( Java, .net, or oracle)
I want to design and manage the electrical power grid and smart-grid integration technologies.
I am interested in designing integrated circuits and microprocessors for modern electronics.
I want to develop next-generation communication protocols for fiber optics and wireless systems.
I am fascinated by control systems and automation logic for industrial robotics.
I want to analyze electromagnetic wave propagation for satellite and cellular communication.
I am interested in power electronics for electric vehicle (EV) charging and battery systems.
I want to work on Very Large Scale Integration (VLSI) design for high-performance chips.
I am driven to develop Digital Signal Processing (DSP) algorithms for audio and video tools.
I want to monitor and control large utility processes using SCADA and industrial networks.
I am interested in antenna design and radio frequency (RF) engineering for high-speed data.
I want to design precision analog circuits and signal filters for scientific measurement.
I am interested in conducting energy audits and optimizing building electrical efficiency.
I want to develop hardware components for the future of quantum computing.
I am driven to mitigate electromagnetic interference (EMI) in sensitive medical electronics.
I want to program microcontrollers to manage sensors and actuators in robotic projects.
I am interested in designing high-voltage substations and transformer distribution networks.
I want to implement secure telecommunication protocols to protect critical infrastructure.
I am keen on creating advanced instrumentation for laboratory and industrial sensing.
I want to use machine learning for predictive maintenance of national electrical grids.
I am interested in optoelectronics, using lasers and LEDs for high-speed communication.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 6. Nursing -

High scores in Verbal Ability and Reading Comprehension with a Strong Inclination for Direct Patient Care, Wellness Advocacy, and Community Health. This aligns with a drive for social service, communication, and hands-on medical assistance (Social).

si.t: Healthcare, Medical Services, Public Health, Nutrition and Dietetics, Psychology, Physical Therapy (BSPT) / Occupational Therapy (BSOT), Respiratory Therapy, Social Work
Chemistry 1 - 4, Biology 1-4, Field Exposure, Safety and First Aid, Research Methods, Empowerment Technologies, Work Immersion
Caregiving (Child Care), Caregiving (Adult care)
I am committed to providing holistic, evidence-based patient care for recovery and comfort.
I want to specialize in critical care nursing to monitor patients in high-stakes environments.
I am interested in educating the community on health prevention and wellness advocacy.
I want to manage trauma responses and medical care in international disaster relief efforts.
I am driven to conduct clinical research that improves nursing protocols and patient safety.
I am interested in geriatric nursing to support the unique health needs of aging populations.
I want to provide mental health support and therapeutic communication for psychiatric patients.
I am keen on working in school health to manage pediatric wellness and immunization.
I want to master nursing informatics to improve patient charting and data accuracy.
I am interested in becoming a Nurse Practitioner to diagnose and treat patients independently.
I want to coordinate hospital disaster preparedness plans for pandemics or mass casualties.
I am driven to educate chronic disease patients on self-management and drug adherence.
I want to specialize in oncology nursing, providing clinical and emotional support to cancer patients.
I am interested in leading nursing units as a manager to ensure efficient staff operations.
I want to specialize in neonatal intensive care (NICU) to provide support for newborns.
I am driven to promote maternal and child health through postpartum and prenatal care.
I want to focus on occupational health nursing to protect the safety of workers in factories.
I am interested in designing public health vaccination campaigns to reduce infectious diseases.
I want to provide skilled medical care to patients within their private home environments.
I am driven to use my clinical expertise as a legal nurse consultant for medical lawsuits.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 7. Medical Technology / Medical Laboratory Science -

High aptitude in Scientific Ability and Attention to Detail with a Strong Inclination for Laboratory Diagnostics and Clinical Analysis. This is indicative of a disciplined interest in investigative research, precision testing, and medical support (Investigative & Conventional).

si.t: Clinical Laboratory, Diagnostics, Research, Radiologic Technology, Environmental and Sanitary Engineering
Biology 1 &2, Chemistry 1 &2, Physics 1 &2, Safety and First Aid, Fundamentals of data Analytics, Data management, Research Methods, Empowerment Technologies
Illustration,Computer Programming (Java or .NET Technology), Visual Graphic Design / Animation,
I want to operate complex laboratory analyzers for clinical blood and chemical testing.
I am interested in interpreting lab results to help doctors diagnose various medical conditions.
I want to develop and validate laboratory tests for newly emerging viral pathogens.
I am interested in blood banking and ensuring the safety and compatibility of transfusions.
I am driven to maintain strict quality control and assurance in high-volume medical labs.
I want to use molecular diagnostics and PCR to identify genetic mutations and cancer.
I am interested in identifying clinical bacteria and determining their antibiotic resistance.
I want to perform toxicology screenings to measure therapeutic drug levels and poisons.
I am interested in managing laboratory automation and ensuring efficient sample workflows.
I want to examine tissue and cell samples under the microscope to detect cancer.
I am interested in analyzing body fluids like spinal and pleural fluid for disease markers.
I want to specialize in endocrine testing and measuring metabolic hormone levels.
I am fascinated by the morphology of blood cells and the science of clotting disorders.
I want to evaluate new diagnostic platforms and automation technologies for efficiency.
I am interested in validating new lab equipment to meet federal CLIA standards.
I want to research how the immune system reacts to diseases through serological testing.
I am interested in screening blood donations for infectious markers and safety.
I want to manage Point-of-Care Testing (POCT) in remote clinics and ambulances.
I am interested in clinical parasitology and identifying parasites in medical specimens.
I am driven to maintain strict biosafety levels when handling hazardous infectious agents.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 8. Pharmacy

- High scores in Scientific Ability and Verbal Ability with a Strong Inclination for Drug Research, Medication Management, and Healthcare Consultation. This highlights a dual interest in the chemical science of drugs and patient interaction/education (Investigative & Social).

si.t: Pharmaceuticals, Drug Research, Healthcare, Clinical Research, Health Information Management (HIM), Healthcare Administration / Management, Health Data Analytics
Pre-Calculus, Physics 1 & 2, Chemistry 1 & 2, Biology 1 & 2, Finite Mathematics 1 &2, Business 1 &2
Medical transcription,Computer Programming (Java or .NET Technology) Visual Graphic Design / Animation,
I am interested in the discovery of new drug molecules and their effects on the body.
I want to work in a clinical setting to optimize drug therapy for individual patients.
I am driven to provide clear medication counseling to patients about side effects and use.
I am interested in industrial pharmacy and the large-scale manufacturing of capsules and tablets.
I want to conduct pharmacoeconomic studies to determine the cost-benefit of new drugs.
I am keen on monitoring drug-drug interactions and patient safety in a hospital pharmacy.
I want to perform pharmaceutical compounding for patients with unique medication needs.
I am interested in pharmacovigilance and monitoring long-term drug safety in the public.
I want to specialize in veterinary pharmacy to provide medications for various animal species.
I am interested in managing a community pharmacy and leading public health initiatives.
I want to research pharmacogenomics to tailor medications to a person's genetic profile.
I am interested in developing innovative drug delivery systems like nanotech or patches.
I want to work in pharmaceutical regulatory affairs to ensure drugs meet national standards.
I am interested in pharmacy informatics to use technology for preventing medication errors.
I want to design and oversee clinical trials to test the safety of experimental medications.
I am interested in geriatric pharmacy to manage polypharmacy in elderly patients.
I want to work in a poison control center to provide expert toxicity and overdose info.
I am interested in nuclear pharmacy and the preparation of radioactive diagnostic agents.
I want to research pharmacognosy, the study of drugs derived from natural plant sources.
I am driven to educate physicians and nurses on proper medication reconciliation steps.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 9. Biology -

High Scientific Ability and Moderate Inclination for Research, paired with a Strong Interest in Life Sciences, Biotechnology, and Environmental Studies. This is characteristic of a student interested in fundamental scientific inquiry and biological systems (Investigative).

si.t: Biotechnology, Environmental Science, Pre-Medicine, Molecular Biology,Biostatistics / Epidemiology, Nutrition and Dietetics, Health Information Management, Environmental and Sanitary Engineering
Biology 1 -4, Chemistry 1 &2, Physics 1 &2, Pre-calculus and calculus, Empowerment Technologies, Research Methods
Caregiving (Child Care), Caregiving (Adult care), Medical transcription, Computer Programming,
I want to manipulate biological systems at the genetic level to develop GMOs for society.
I am interested in studying diverse ecosystems and developing wildlife conservation plans.
I want to study human physiology and disease mechanisms to prepare for medical school.
I am driven to conduct laboratory research on microbial genetics and biotechnology.
I want to use DNA sequencing and genetic fingerprinting to solve criminal investigations.
I am interested in marine biology and the impact of climate change on coral reefs.
I want to research molecular biology to understand cellular communication and organelles.
I am interested in epidemiology and studying how infectious diseases spread in populations.
I want to study plant biology to improve agricultural yields and food security.
I am interested in ecological restoration and returning damaged lands to health.
I want to research the brain and neural mechanisms that lead to mental disorders.
I am driven to develop sustainable biofuels using plant biology and genetic engineering.
I want to work in forensic labs analyzing biological evidence like blood and hair.
I am interested in learning detailed human anatomy through medical-grade dissection.
I want to study paleontology and trace the evolutionary history of vertebrates through fossils.
I am interested in environmental toxicology and how industrial chemicals affect life.
I want to research animal behavior to improve conservation strategies for endangered species.
I am interested in using bioinformatics software to map and analyze the human genome.
I want to research developmental biology and how cells form complex living organisms.
I am interested in researching the human gut microbiome and its impact on nutrition.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 10. Chemistry -

High aptitude in Scientific Ability and Logical Reasoning with a Strong Inclination for Chemical Analysis, Material Synthesis, and Industrial Quality Control. This suggests a primary interest in the structure and transformation of matter (Investigative & Realistic).

si.t: Industrial Chemistry, Research, Quality Control, Medical Technology / Medical Laboratory Science, Radiologic Technology, Environmental and Sanitary Engineering, Nutrition and Dietetics, Biochemistry
Chemistry 1 - 4, Physics 1 &2, Pre-calculus and calculus, Biology 1 &2, research methods, Physics 1 &2, Empowerment Technologies
Aesthetic Services, Food Processing, Organic Agriculture Production, Computer Systems Servicing, Computer Programming (.NET or Java)
I want to optimize chemical processes for the production of polymers and fuels.
I am interested in using spectroscopy and chromatography for chemical quality control.
I want to design and synthesize complex organic molecules for the drug industry.
I am interested in environmental chemistry and monitoring water and soil pollution.
I want to use chemical thermodynamics to improve the efficiency of industrial yields.
I am interested in chemical testing for food safety and nutritional certification.
I want to develop new chemical catalysts for cleaner energy-efficient manufacturing.
I am fascinated by polymer science and developing new durable plastics and fibers.
I want to research inorganic chemistry to create next-generation battery materials.
I am interested in forensic chemistry and identifying trace evidence from crime scenes.
I want to work in fragrance and flavor chemistry to formulate new consumer products.
I am interested in astrochemistry and analyzing the molecular components of deep space.
I want to develop green chemistry methods that reduce hazardous waste in manufacturing.
I am interested in managing industrial chemical safety and hazardous waste compliance.
I want to conduct quality control testing on the purity of pharmaceutical raw materials.
I am interested in atmospheric chemistry and studying the effects of gases on ozone.
I want to develop new surface coatings and industrial paints with heat-resistant properties.
I am driven to improve the energy efficiency of chemical reactors in heavy industry.
I want to research electrochemistry for the development of clean hydrogen fuel cells.
I am interested in formulating cosmetics and testing their safety and stability for skin.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 11. Mathematics / Statistics

- Excellent standing in Mathematical Ability and Logical Reasoning with a Strong Inclination for Abstract Modeling, Data Quantification, and Financial/Risk Analysis. This shows a preference for theoretical and applied quantitative reasoning (Investigative & Conventional).

si.t: Applied Mathematics, Accountancy, Data Analysis, Actuarial Science, Education, Finance, Physics
Finite Mathematics 1&2, Trigonometry 1 &2, Chemistry 1 &2, Physics 1 &2, Pre-calculus and calculus, Empowerment Technologies, Biology 1 &2, research methods,
Computer Programming (.NET or Java), Computer Systems Servicing
I want to use statistical learning to find patterns in massive datasets.
I am interested in applying probability to calculate financial risks for insurance.
I am passionate about math pedagogy and finding new ways to teach abstract concepts.
I want to develop quantitative models for analyzing stock markets and financial trends.
I am interested in pure mathematics research, focusing on number theory or topology.
I want to specialize in Bayesian statistics to design more accurate scientific trials.
I am driven to become a certified actuary to manage pension and insurance liabilities.
I want to use operations research to solve logistics and resource allocation problems.
I am interested in using differential equations to model physical and biological systems.
I want to develop and test algorithms for automated high-frequency trading.
I am fascinated by graph theory and its use in analyzing social and internet networks.
I want to work in biostatistics to design and analyze outcomes of medical trials.
I am interested in using computer simulations to help students visualize math concepts.
I want to apply game theory to analyze competition and decision-making in economics.
I am interested in exploring the formal logic and set theory that underpin mathematics.
I want to use time-series analysis for forecasting climate changes or market trends.
I am driven to research abstract algebra and its applications in digital coding theory.
I want to apply linear algebra and numerical methods to solve large-scale engineering problems.
I am interested in geometry and topology for designing smooth curves in CAD tools.
I am passionate about coaching students for high-level math and logic competitions.

r.t: STEM PATHWAY 12. Education major in Sciences -

High Verbal Ability and Reading Comprehension with a Strong Inclination for STEM Teaching, Mentorship, and Curriculum Development. This reflects a passion for academic content delivery and social influence in an educational setting (Social & Investigative).

si.t: STEM Teaching, Curriculum Development, Educational Leadership
Chemistry 1&2, Physics 1 &2, Pre-calculus and calculus, Biology 1 &2, research methods, Physics 1 &2, Empowerment Technologies
animation, Illustration, Visual Graphic Design
I want to make complex scientific concepts accessible to high school students.
I am interested in designing interdisciplinary STEM curricula that integrate technology.
I want to mentor science teachers and lead academic science departments in schools.
I am interested in using digital tools and interactive simulations for science learning.
I want to conduct educational research to measure the effectiveness of science teaching.
I am driven to develop inquiry-based science labs for hands-on student discovery.
I want to evaluate textbooks and lab equipment to ensure they meet modern standards.
I am interested in reducing educational disparities in STEM for underserved students.
I want to design science outreach programs for science centers and museums.
I am driven to facilitate professional development workshops for STEM educators.
I am interested in designing school projects that connect biology, chemistry, and engineering.
I want to serve as a school administrator to integrate STEM principles across all grades.
I want to develop assessments that measure conceptual understanding, not just memory.
I am interested in coaching students for science fairs and robotics competitions.
I want to use educational neuroscience to improve student memory and retention in science.
I want to partner with local industries to bring real-world science to the classroom.
I am driven to lead the creation of culturally relevant science curricula for diverse schools.
I am interested in researching the use of VR and AR tools for immersive science education.
I want to lead advocacy efforts to increase state funding for school science labs.
I am passionate about developing students' ability to communicate complex science clearly.
